radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is slightly echogenic, compatible with fatty infiltration. No space-occupying lesions are identified. Normal hepatopetal flow in the portal vein. The IVC is patent. No intrahepatic or common biliary dilation, with the latter measuring 3 mm. The bladder is contracted around multiple shadowing gallstones, demonstrating a wall echo shadow sign. No significant gallbladder wall edema or pericholecystic fluid. Ultrasonographic ___ sign was negative. The pancreatic head and body are normal, and the tail is not well visualized due to shadowing bowel gas.
